com.alien.rfid

Class Mask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alien.rfid.Mask

  • public class Mask
extends java.lang.Object
    The Gen2 protocol Mask used for RFID operations.
    See Also:
    RFIDReader

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Mask NONE
      No mask is set.

    • Field Detail

      • NONE

        public static final Mask NONE
        No mask is set.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mask

        public Mask(Bank bank,
    int bitPointer,
    int bitLength,
    java.lang.String data)
     throws InvalidParamException
        Create a mask. The pointer and length values are bit-oriented. The data is provided as a string of hex digits (example: "AABB1122").
        Parameters:
        bank - memory bank to mask on
        bitPointer - bit pointer within the memory bank
        bitLength - mask length (bits)
        data - mask data (hex string)
        Throws:
        InvalidParamException

    • Method Detail

      • maskEPC

        public static Mask maskEPC(java.lang.String data)
                    throws InvalidParamException
        Create a mask for tags that have an EPC starting with a given hex string data.
        Parameters:
        data - the starting EPC data, as a hex string (example: "AABB1122")
        Returns:
        Mask object
        Throws:
        InvalidParamException

      • maskTID

        public static Mask maskTID(java.lang.String data)
                    throws InvalidParamException
        Create a mask for tags that have TID memory bank data starting with a given hex string data.
        Parameters:
        data - the starting TID memory bank data, as a hex string (example: "AABB1122")
        Returns:
        Mask object
        Throws:
        InvalidParamException

      • maskUser

        public static Mask maskUser(java.lang.String data)
                     throws InvalidParamException
        Create a mask for tags that have User memory bank data starting with a given hex string data.
        Parameters:
        data - the starting User memory bank data, as a hex string (example: "AABB1122")
        Returns:
        Mask object
        Throws:
        InvalidParamException
